insertStudent: INSERT INTO student_records(id, enrollment_no, abc_id, gr_no, aadhar_number, stream, semester, main_course, first_secondary_subject, tertiary_secondary_subject, student_gender, email, whatsapp_no, surname, name, fathername, father_name, mother_name, address, city, district, pincode, birth_date, birth_place, caste, parent_contact_no, last_organization_studied_from, last_studied_year, elective_course, student_image) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
selectAll: SELECT id, enrollment_no, abc_id, gr_no, aadhar_number, stream, semester, main_course, first_secondary_subject, tertiary_secondary_subject, student_gender, email, whatsapp_no, surname, name, fathername, father_name, mother_name, address, city, district, pincode, birth_date, birth_place, caste, parent_contact_no, last_organization_studied_from, last_studied_year, elective_course FROM student_records
